acceptance_criteria: App accepts a CSV file containing time sheet data
App validates the uploaded CSV file for errors
App calculates the total hours worked, average hours worked per day, and other relevant metrics for each employee
App displays the calculated metrics in a clear and concise manner using charts and graphs
App generates a comprehensive evaluation report for each employee
App is responsive and accessible on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
App is compatible with screen readers and other assistive technologies
App has a clear and consistent navigation structure and labeling system
